name: joplin-plugin-export-to-ssg

scripts.dist: webpack --joplin-plugin-config buildMain && webpack --joplin-plugin-config buildExtraScripts && webpack --joplin-plugin-config createArchive

description: This is a joplin plugin that exports collection of notes from [Joplin](https://joplinapp.org/) as markdown file along with their static files[ images , pdfs etc] to static site generator(ssg) project.
author: aman-d-1-n-only
